description: This refreshing quinoa salad is topped with tasty satay tofu. A delicious vegeterian recipe, it's perfect for alfresco dining, work lunches or a summer BBQ.
keywords: Grain salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Winter,Low sugar,Halal,High protein,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tofu,Spinach,Dairy free
name: Satay Tofu Quinoa Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups Macro Organic frozen cut green beans
2 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
200g Macro Organic baby cucumbers, halved lengthways
4 Macro Organic spring onions, thinly sliced
2 cups Macro Organic baby spinach leaves
0.25 cup Macro dry roasted almonds, coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook quinoa according to packet directions.
Meanwhile, steam or microwave beans until tender. Drain, rinse under cold water, then drain.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook tofu for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and heated through. Halve tofu pieces.
Divide quinoa, tofu, beans, cucumber, onion, carrot and spinach among bowls. Serve sprinkled with almonds.
